A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand that that new characters where needed\, but this has proved to be a nail in the coffin. The director basically said \"let's ignore everything good from the original trilogy and go a new way. we don't need heroes\, story lines or character development because we have a CGI and a really bad script\". The galactic hero\, Luke\, became the zero ( I was half expecting to hear \"Get off my lawn\"). If Han had survived\, they could have stole the name \"Grumpy Old Men\". At least\, I won't waste my money anything else Star Wars related.
